solution_line_template: The first ball is a third of the size of the third ball, so it used {yarn_for_third_ball} / {third_ball_ratio_denominator} = <<{yarn_for_third_ball}/{third_ball_ratio_denominator}={yarn_for_first_ball}>>{yarn_for_first_ball} feet of yarn.

The second ball is twice the size of the first ball, so she used {yarn_for_first_ball} * {second_ball_ratio_multiplier} = <<{yarn_for_first_ball}*{second_ball_ratio_multiplier}={yarn_for_second_ball}>>{yarn_for_second_ball} feet of yarn.
